title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer and reason

v(1.5) = 1.5 sin(1.52) = 1.167

Up, because v(1.5) > 0
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer and reason

v(1.5) = 1.5 sin(1.52) = 1.167

Up, because v(1.5) > 0

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer and reason

v(1.5) = 1.5 sin(1.52) = 1.167

Up, because v(1.5) > 0
